ISSUE.TITLE: Bump EasyPost-Official Package (Dependency)
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: NA Steps to reproduce the problem: The version of [EasyPost-Official](https://www.nuget.org/packages/EasyPost-Official/) being used in this repo was unlisted on Nuget and should be bumped to the latest (`v2.8.2` at the time of this writing) due to an incorrectly packaged version at `v2.7.0` which is in use in this project. It should be as easy as a version swap as no breaking changes were introduced.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #6248 Add ada attributes to anchor tag (#6249)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #6188 Some next changes to update EasyPost shipping plugin to 3.0
